name: Painter Selection Portfolio Library
summary: Learn about .SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Painter offers various features for illustrating artwork and modifying photographs. Saved path-based selections saved in SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files provide a quick way to insert a shape into a Painter file. Default selections include a circle, rounded square, globe, star, and spiral.
You can add or remove a library of selections through the Media Library panel. To open this feature, select Window → Media Panels → Selections and click the "Selection Portfolio" tab.

instructions: You can open a SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file with Corel Painter. For example, to open an SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file, select Window → Media Panels → Selections and click the "Import Selection Portfolio" icon in the "Selection Portfolio" tab.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
